author: siladu
content:
OK, latest docker image has blockValue (= 0) and also added withdrawals array to eth_getBlockByHash/Number for good measure: `docker pull siladu/besu:22.10.3-SNAPSHOT-openjdk-latest`
(built from https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/4818)

Will only be online for the next 30-60mins until tomorrow, so if any issues hopefully <@386930523815149571> can help out.

author: barnabasbusa
content: ok. I'll quickly update all besu nodes.

author: barnabasbusa
content: works like a charm. Nodes are syncing up.

author: barnabasbusa
content: Gonna give it a couple mins to sync to head, and see if it can propose blocks too.

author: siladu
content: <@554799849288105986> I think you were looking for withdrawals in eth_getBlockByHash, besu has that on the testnet now

author: m.kalinin
content: Proposed a unification of a failure mode when the wrong datastructure version is used, https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/337
